up_url.title: Up URL
up_url.description: The URL to send the 'UP' command

down_url.title: Down URL
down_url.description: The URL to send the 'DOWN' command.

stop_url.title: Stop URL
stop_url.description: The URL to send the 'STOP' command.

position_url.title: Position URL
position_url.description: The URL to get the current blinds position (must be 0-100 response).

use_same_url_for_stop.title: Use Same URL for Stop
use_same_url_for_stop.description: Instead of using the 'STOP' command, just re-send the 'UP' or 'DOWN' command.

http_method.title: HTTP Parameters
http_method.description: JSON object with custom request HTTP parameters/headers for up/down/stop URL's.

motion_time.title: Motion Time
motion_time.description: Time (in ms) for blinds to move completely from up to down.

response_lag.title: Response Lag
response_lag.description: Time (in ms) for device to respond after HTTP request. Optional parameter to improve time calculation when setting intermediate values.

trigger_stop_at_boundaries.title: Send Stop at Boundaries
trigger_stop_at_boundaries.description: Send STOP command at boundaries (0/100) - used if blinds do not stop automatically.

success_codes.title: HTTP success codes
success_codes.description: Array of response codes that are interpreted as a successful reply.

max_http_attempts.title: Maximum HTTP attempts
max_http_attempts.description: Maximum number of HTTP attempts (on error or timeout) per request.

verbose.title: Verbose logging
verbose.description: Verbose logging - show getTargetPosition / getTargetState / getCurrentPosition requests.
